TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SignInRequestMessage extends System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage

summary.span: 表示 WS-Federation Sign-In 请求消息。

span.span: Represents a WS-Federation Sign-In Request message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WS 联合身份验证登录消息是由发送信赖方 (RP) 给安全令牌服务 (STS) 以请求安全令牌。A WS-Federation sign-in message is sent by a relying party (RP) to a security token service (STS) to request a security token. Wa 参数必须设置为"wsignout1.0"并且 wtrealm 参数应设置为所请求的资源 （这通常是请求的资源的 URL） 的安全领域。The wa parameter must be set to "wsignout1.0" and the wtrealm parameter should be set to the security realm of the requested resource (this is often the URL of the requested resource). 此外可能在请求中指定其他可选参数。Other optional parameters may also be specified in the request. 一个的静态方法创建消息类，例如方法中，当 wa 参数设置为"wsignin1.0"，没有任何 wresult 或 wresultptr 参数存在，并且 wtrealm 参数或存在 wreply 参数。A message is created by the static methods of the class, for example the method, when the wa parameter is set to "wsignin1.0", there is no wresult or wresultptr parameter present, and either a wtrealm parameter or a wreply parameter is present. > [!IMPORTANT] > 用于 Active Directory 联合身份验证服务 (AD FS) 版本 1.0 的向后兼容，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 允许 wtrealm 参数或 wreply 参数要设置 （或两者） 的签名消息为有效，则为但是，WS 联合身份验证协议要求 wtrealm 参数为登录请求中存在。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大多数情况下，应确保指定的 wtrealm 参数。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified. 类公开可用于设置或访问单独的消息参数的多个属性。The class exposes several properties that can be used to set or access individual message parameters. 这些参数还可以设置或通过访问字典。These parameters can also be set or accessed through the dictionary. 例如，你可以读取消息中的 wtrealm 参数是属性或通过指定"wtrealm"作为的关键字典。For example, you can read the wtrealm parameter in the message either through the property or by specifying "wtrealm" as the key to the dictionary. [!INCLUDE[wif_wsfed_ref](~/includes/wif-wsfed-ref-md.md)] ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifSignInMessage#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsigninmessage/cs/webapplication1/default.aspx.cs#2)]

summary.span: 支持向后兼容性的非标准消息创建。

span.span: Supports non-standard message creation for backward compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wa 消息参数 (属性) 将初始化为"wsignin1.0"。The wa message parameter (the property) is initialized to "wsignin1.0". 支持向后兼容性的非标准消息创建。Supports non-standard message creation for backward compatibility. 在通常情况下，必须指定 wtrealm 消息参数。In the typical case, a wtrealm message parameter must be specified. 此构造函数允许仅 wreply 消息参数指定为与 Active Directory 联合身份验证服务 (AD FS) 1.0 版的向后兼容性。This constructor allows only a wreply message parameter to be specified for backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Service (AD FS) version 1.0.

exception.span: 和 为 或空字符串。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AuthenticationType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AuthenticationType : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 wauth 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the wauth parameter of the message.
The authentication type.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wauth 参数就像在 WS 信任环境中定义的 wst: authenticationtype 元素。The wauth parameter is like the wst:AuthenticationType element defined in WS-Trust. 值应设置为一个字符串，包含一个 URI，标识已使用的身份验证类型。The value should be set to a string that contains a URI that identifies the type of authentication that is used. Wauth 参数是可选的。The wauth parameter is optional. 设置属性设置为`null`或空字符串来移除该消息的 wauth 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wauth parameter from the message.

exception.span: 设置完全无效的 URI 值的尝试发生。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

span.span: Gets or sets the wct parameter of the message.

value.span: 在 UTC 中为 datetime 的字符串指定 wct 参数的值。

span.span: The value of the wct parameter specified as a datetime string in UTC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wct 参数指定在创建消息的当前时间。The wct parameter specifies the current time at the instant that the message was created. Wct 参数是可选的。The wct parameter is optional. 设置为属性`null`或空字符串来从消息中删除 wct 参数。Set to the property `null` or an empty string to remove the wct parameter from the message.

exception.span: 尝试设置无效事件字符串的值。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid datetime string occurs.

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 wfed 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the wfed parameter of the message.
The value of the wfed parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wfed 参数指定的消息的联合身份验证上下文。The wfed parameter specifies the federation context for the message. Wfed 参数是可选的。The wfed parameter is optional. 设置为属性`null`或空字符串来移除该消息的 wfed 参数。Set to the property `null` or an empty string to remove the wfed parameter from the message.

member this.Freshness : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 wfresh 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the wfresh parameter of the message.
The value of the wfresh parameter.

value.span: 这应该是表示作为字符串的整数。

span.span: This should be an integer represented as a string.

value.span: 他指定以分钟为单位的最大生存期是有效的身份验证。

span.span: It specifies the maximum age in minutes that the authentication is valid.

value.span: 零表发布标记前应提示用户。

span.span: Zero indicates that the user should be prompted before the token is issued.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wfresh 参数指示以分钟为单位的身份验证是有效的最大生存期。The wfresh parameter indicates the maximum age in minutes that the authentication is valid. Wfresh 参数是可选的。The wfresh parameter is optional. 设置属性设置为`null`或空字符串来移除该消息的 wfresh 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wfresh parameter from the message.

exception.span: 尝试设置一个不是整数的字符串表示形式的值。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a string representation of an integer.

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 whr 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the whr parameter of the message.
The value of the whr parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Whr 参数标识要用于请求的标识提供程序的安全领域。The whr parameter identifies the security realm of the identity provider to use for the request. 它可以指定为要使用 IP STS 的 URL 或理解的请求的接收方的标识符。It can be specified as the URL of the IP-STS to use or as an identifier that is understood by the receiver of the request. Whr 参数是可选的组属性设置为`null`或空字符串来移除该消息的 whr 参数。The whr parameter is optional Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the whr parameter from the message.

The value of the wp parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标识要用于请求的策略。Identifies the policy to be used for the request. 它通常适用于操作 （wa 参数），但可能会更广泛的影响。It typically applies to the action (wa parameter), but may have broader implications. Wp 参数是可选的。The wp parameter is optional. 设置属性设置为`null`或空字符串来移除该消息的 wp 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wp parameter from the message.

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 wtrealm 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the wtrealm parameter of the message.
The value of the wtrealm parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wtrealm 参数指定请求的资源所属的安全领域。The wtrealm parameter specifies the security realm to which the requested resource belongs. 这通常是资源的请求的 URL。This is often the URL of the requested resource. > [!IMPORTANT] > 用于 Active Directory 联合身份验证服务 (AD FS) 版本 1.0 的向后兼容，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 允许 wtrealm 参数或 wreply 参数要设置 （或两者） 的签名消息为有效，则为但是，WS 联合身份验证协议要求 wtrealm 参数为登录请求中存在。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大多数情况下，应确保指定的 wtrealm 参数。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified. 设置属性设置为`null`或空字符串来移除该消息的 wtrealm 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wtrealm parameter from the message.

exception.span: 设置完全无效的 URI 值的尝试发生。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Reply { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Reply : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 wreply 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the wreply parameter of the message.
The value of the wreply parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含响应应定向到的 URI。Contains the URI to which responses should be directed. Wtrealm 参数通常用于指定此 URI。The wtrealm parameter is often used to specify this URI. 但是，在更复杂的情况下，可以使用的 wtrealm 参数来指定请求，例如，整个网站，安全领域和 wreply 参数可用于指定该领域，例如，文档、 页上中的特定资源或终结点。However, in more complex scenarios, the wtrealm parameter can be used to specify the security realm for the request, for example, the entire web site, and the wreply parameter can be used to specify a specific resource within that realm, for example, a document, page, or endpoint. Wreply 参数是可选的。The wreply parameter is optional. 设置属性设置为`null`或空字符串来移除该消息的 wreply 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreply parameter from the message. > [!IMPORTANT] > 用于 Active Directory 联合身份验证服务 (AD FS) 版本 1.0 的向后兼容，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 允许 wtrealm 参数或 wreply 参数要设置 （或两者） 的签名消息为有效，则为但是，WS 联合身份验证协议要求 wtrealm 参数为登录请求中存在。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大多数情况下，应确保指定的 wtrealm 参数。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified.

exception.span: 设置完全无效的 URI 值的尝试发生。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wreq 参数指定使用的令牌请求``元素或完整的请求消息 WS 信任中所述。The wreq parameter specifies a token request using either a `` element or a full request message as described in WS-Trust. Wreq 参数是可选的。The wreq parameter is optional. 设置属性设置为`null`或空字符串来移除该消息的 wreq 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreq parameter from the message. 如果指定属性，则不能指定属性。If the property is specified, the property cannot be specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 用于 Active Directory 联合身份验证服务 (AD FS) 版本 1.0 的向后兼容，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 允许 wtrealm 参数或 wreply 参数要设置 （或两者） 的签名消息为有效，则为但是，WS 联合身份验证协议要求 wtrealm 参数为登录请求中存在。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大多数情况下，应确保指定的 wtrealm 参数。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified.
